event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{In function {0} an exception of type {1} is thrown and never caught.}{{code{main(int, char **)}}}{{code{std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: If the exception is ever thrown, the program will crash.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: A C++ exception is thrown but never caught
